item.title: Abandoned vehicle with unregistered number plate, 1st February
item.description:
The vehicle has not moved in over one month. It has received 3 parking fines likely due to not having a permit for parking. Upon checking if the vehicle is taxed, the number plate is not registered to a vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Oakley Drive, New Eltham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping & Rat Infestation, 1st February
item.description:
Fly tipping causing rat infestation, first reported months ago and no action taken. Fly tipping has increased and now blocks entry into property, no mobility access possible. It is not TFL responsibility, it is council property, please action asap.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
